ing: 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
n: Feta and Roasted Red Pepper Dip
des: "Trying to recreate a feta dip we like from a local Greek restaurant, I ran across a recipe similar to this on the internet and adjusted it to come up with this. Eat with tortilla chips or pita bread or cut up veggies."
ins: Place the roasted pepper, garlic, feta cheese, yogurt, and cayenne pepper into a blender. Cover, and blend until smooth.
